mosinstall.name: Being Watched Videos- Seyret Pro
mosinstall.author: Mustafa Dindar
mosinstall.description: This module shows beingwatched videos list in a flash container.

param.name: width
param.label: Flash Width
param.description: Defines the width of flash.

param.name: height
param.label: Flash Height
param.description: Defines the height of flash.

param.name: refresh
param.label: Refresh Time
param.description: Defines the refresh time as seconds.

param.name: columncount
param.label: Column Count
param.description: Defines the column count.

param.name: rowcount
param.label: Row Count
param.description: Defines the row count.

param.name: thumbscale
param.label: Thumb Scale %
param.description: Defines the thumb scale. Between 0-100

param.name: showreflection
param.label: Show Reflection
param.description: Show Thumb Reflection

param.name: textcolor
param.label: Text Color
param.description: Defines the color of text.

param.name: textbold
param.label: Title Text Bold
param.description: Define weight of title text.

param.name: frontcolor
param.label: Front Color
param.description: Defines the color of flash front face.

param.name: basecolor
param.label: Base Color
param.description: Defines the color of base. This will complement your site if you use rounded corners.

param.name: borderwidth
param.label: Border Width
param.description: Defines the width of border.

param.name: bordercolor
param.label: Border Color
param.description: Defines the color of border.

param.name: xround
param.label: X Round
param.description: X Round. Use 0 for no rounded borders.

param.name: yround
param.label: Y Round
param.description: Y Round. Use 0 for no rounded borders.

param.name: spinnerred
param.label: Spinner Red Offset
param.description: Defines the red offset of loading spinner. Between 0-255

param.name: spinnergreen
param.label: Spinner Green Offset
param.description: Defines the green offset of loading spinner. Between 0-255

param.name: spinnerblue
param.label: Spinner Blue Offset
param.description: Defines the blue offset of loading spinner. Between 0-255

param.name: spnw
param.label: Spinner Width
param.description: Defines the width of loading spinner.

param.name: spnh
param.label: Spinner Height
param.description: Defines the height of loading spinner.

param.name: siteurl
param.label: Seyret Site Url
param.description: Leave blank if you want to use it on your site.
